programme.title: I Love You, Man
Čovječe, volim te
programme.desc:
I Love You, Man: Directed by John Hamburg. With Paul Rudd, Rashida Jones, Sarah Burns, Greg Levine. Friendless Peter Klaven goes on a series of man-dates to find a Best Man for his wedding. But, when his insta-bond with his new B.F.F. puts a strain on his relationship with his fiancée, can the trio learn to live happily ever after?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1155056/","name":"I Love You, Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU4MjI5NTEyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjQ1NTMzMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Friendless Peter Klaven goes on a series of man-dates to find a Best Man for his wedding. But, when his insta-bond with his new B.F.F. puts a strain on his relationship with his fiancée, can the trio learn to live happily ever after?","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1155056/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Quinoa1984"},"dateCreated":"2009-03-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"the plot isn't what works- it's all about actors, timing, awkward pauses, realistic dialog","reviewBody":"I Love You, Man may feel like another Apatow company production, but it's mostly because some of its "stock" company players (I put quotes as it's both a loose term and just about right) like Paul Rudd and Jason Siegel. They give the air of using the screenplay as the easiest of diving boards into just shooting-the-hell-of-it with one another as two friends. Rudd plays a guy about to get married and is embarrassed to find out, from all those around him more than anything, that he doesn't have many, or really any, true friends. He meets Siegel at an open house for Lou Ferrigno (he's a real estate agent and Ferrigno fills the oddball cameo choice, it's a great choice though), and the two hit it off as a "bromance" develops.

It's this "bromance" that makes I Love You, Man a little interesting as a double-edged romantic comedy. It's already about Rudd and his to-be played by Rashida Jones, their little moments of fun and their arguments too (there's a cute running gag involving Rudd's imitations of the band Rush sounding like an Irishman), but then it's also got plenty of innuendo to this being really about the guys, how Siegel gets attached to Rudd in that way that surely isn't gay but is more than just casual acquaintance stuff (see his "investment" plan unfold). But truth be told it's not even this that makes I Love You, Man so funny.

Rudd and Siegel are simply funny guys, but naturally so; there's a new trend to put a somewhat straight face on gross out gags in these movies, Apatow or its spin-off groups (one can equate it to the good rip-offs of Tarantino in the 90s to a certain extent), and it works very well here. It's like a sweet blending of Curb Your Enthusiasm awkwardness (if, of course, nowhere near the genius of that, especially with story) and some of the low-brow Adam Sandler stuff and joyfully useless banter and non-jock male bonding. It's not any better or lessor than recent stuff from Siegel and Rudd; you could watch this with either Forgetting Sarah Marshall or Role Models and be satisfied about the same. Again, plot is not at all the strong suit, but if you just want some cleverly obvious comedy dialog it's a good detour.

At the least, we get one of the funniest lines of the year, or just in years, near the very end: "I love you... Broseph Goebbels!"","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":198802,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2009-06-10","keywords":"homosexual subtext,bromance,friend,gay brother,reference to neil peart","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"I Love You, Man: Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1133445913","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExODA3NjQ1OTleQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDk4MTM3MzMx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExODA3NjQ1OTleQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDk4MTM3MzMx._V1_.jpg","description":"Friendless Peter Klaven (Rudd) goes on a series of man-dates to find a Best Man for his wedding. But when his insta-bond his new B.F.F.(Segel) puts a strain on his relationship with his fiancÃ©e (Jones) can the trio learn to live happily ever after?"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0748620/","name":"Paul Rudd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0781981/","name":"Jason Segel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0429069/","name":"Rashida Jones"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0357453/","name":"John Hamburg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033149/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0265280/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0357453/","name":"John Hamburg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0505648/","name":"Larry Levin"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: San wa
Mit
programme.desc:
San wa: Directed by Stanley Tong. With Bing Shao, Jackie Chan, Weixing Yao, Jianzhong Zhang. Archeologist Jack keeps having reoccurring dreams of a past life, where he is the great General Meng Yi, who is sworn to protect a Korean Princess named Ok-Soo. Jack decides to go investigate everything with his friend William." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0365847/","name":"San wa","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTYxYzExYjEtODJkNC00NTBkLWE0YmMtOWIxMTk1ZWVhYTcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzI1NzMxNzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Archeologist Jack keeps having reoccurring dreams of a past life, where he is the great General Meng Yi, who is sworn to protect a Korean Princess named Ok-Soo. Jack decides to go investigate everything with his friend William.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0365847/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MosHr"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Worth it for the rat glue factory scene alone","reviewBody":"It's worth seeing the movie just even for the rat glue factory scene. It's a wonderful Jackie Chan physical comedy combined with a really nice striptease from the super hot Indian actress. Sure to become a classic scene.

The rest of the movie constitutes of a historical "Hero" like war martial art action with some modern Jackie Chan slapstick. The plot is very tenuous and was probably written after someone wanted a story with Chinese history combined with a modern drive towards the nascent Chinese scientific and technological resurgence.

Jackie Chan plays an Indiana Jones like archaeologist which spirals into a Lara Croft style adventure of finding very strange but mindbogglingly powerful things. Meanwhile a very hazy parallel story runs of a concubine who falls for a general played by Jackie Chan a few hundreds years in the past. There is anti-gravity devices and immortality pills thrown in as well.

Though it does get really cheesy and maudlin at times, it's a really fun movie to watch.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14989,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-03-29","keywords":"warrior,ancient china,reincarnation,hare krishna,time travel","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0788405/","name":"Bing Shao"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000329/","name":"Jackie Chan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2274407/","name":"Weixing Yao"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0867262/","name":"Stanley Tong"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0210533/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049799/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0867262/","name":"Stanley Tong"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0910924/","name":"Hui-Ling Wang"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1934885/","name":"Hai-shu Li"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

Jack decides to go investigate everything with his friend William.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0365847/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"MosHr","dateCreated":"2005-11-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Worth it for the rat glue factory scene alone","reviewBody":"It's worth seeing the movie just even for the rat glue factory scene. It's a wonderful Jackie Chan physical comedy combined with a really nice striptease from the super hot Indian actress. Sure to become a classic scene.

The rest of the movie constitutes of a historical "Hero" like war martial art action with some modern Jackie Chan slapstick. The plot is very tenuous and was probably written after someone wanted a story with Chinese history combined with a modern drive towards the nascent Chinese scientific and technological resurgence.

Jackie Chan plays an Indiana Jones like archaeologist which spirals into a Lara Croft style adventure of finding very strange but mindbogglingly powerful things. Meanwhile a very hazy parallel story runs of a concubine who falls for a general played by Jackie Chan a few hundreds years in the past. There is anti-gravity devices and immortality pills thrown in as well.

Though it does get really cheesy and maudlin at times, it's a really fun movie to watch.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14989,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-03-29","keywords":"warrior,ancient china,reincarnation,hare krishna,time travel","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0788405/","name":"Bing Shao","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000329/","name":"Jackie Chan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2274407/","name":"Weixing Yao"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0867262/","name":"Stanley Tong"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0210533/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049799/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0867262/","name":"Stanley Tong","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0910924/","name":"Hui-Ling Wang","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1934885/","name":"Hai-shu Li"],"duration":"PT2H2M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Duplicity
Ti mi lažeš najbolje
programme.desc:
Duplicity: Directed by Tony Gilroy. With Clive Owen, Julia Roberts, Tom Wilkinson, Paul Giamatti. Two ex-government agents turned rival industrial spies have to be at the top of their game when one of their companies prepares to launch a major product. However, they distract each other in more ways than one." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1135487/","name":"Duplicity","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE2MTg2MzU2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTMyNjkxMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two ex-government agents turned rival industrial spies have to be at the top of their game when one of their companies prepares to launch a major product. However, they distract each other in more ways than one.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1135487/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ferguson-6"},"dateCreated":"2009-03-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Game on","reviewBody":"Greetings again from the darkness. The very imaginative and quite funny opening credit sequence sets the stage for a fun frolic through the world of corporate espionage. The only two problems ... it's not that much fun and there is very little frolicking.

Writer/Director Tony Gilroy (Michael Clayton) just tries to be too clever and cute for his own good. After landing two perfect leads and two of the best character actors of this generation, Gilroy offers up a tedious, bungled mess that is really never that clever and certainly gives the feeling of holding back these four fine actors.

The multi-frame look, non-linear time line, repeated dialogue and smirky exchanges between Clive and Julia are just some of the clichéd tricks used to make this seem more interesting and complicated than it really is.

Clive Owen shows again that he would have made a sterling James Bond (nothing against Daniel Craig, who is excellent). Instead of his usual dark, brooding roles, he seems to thrive when he can show a bit of emotion. Luckily for the audience, we are only subjected to one of Julia Roberts' patented cackles that causes every man to cringe. For her, she is quite reserved, but just can't pull off the smartest person in the room role. Sadly, the great Tom Wilkinson is pretty much wasted in his role as one of the dueling corporate giants. Paul Giamatti, on the other hand, has the best scene in the film as he delivers over-the-top arrogance in his stockholders speech.

Must also mention Tom McCarthy, not so much for his role (he is the guy handcuffed in the meeting room), but just because I have become such a fan of his directorial skills ... The Station Agent and The Visitor.

If you are after a dime store version of Michael Clayton or a mostly non-funny Cary Grant type film, then this is the film for you. To me, it just doesn't deliver the quips, twist or turns that it pretends to.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":49303,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Romance"],"datePublished":"2009-05-06","keywords":"spy versus spy,frame up,written by director,split screen,scene before opening credits","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Duplicity: Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3650552601","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI4NjczODY5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODk1NzAzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI4NjczODY5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODk1NzAzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A pair of corporate spies who share a steamy past hook up to pull off the ultimate con job on their respective bosses"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000210/","name":"Julia Roberts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654110/","name":"Clive Owen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929489/","name":"Tom Wilkinson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006904/","name":"Tony Gilroy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0214437/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006904/","name":"Tony Gilroy"}],"duration":"PT2H5M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
Spider-Man 3
programme.desc:
Spider-Man 3: Directed by Sam Raimi. With Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, James Franco, Thomas Haden Church. A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0413300/","name":"Spider-Man 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTk3MDljOWQtNGI2My00OTEzLTlhYjQtOTQ4ODM2MzUwY2IwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413300/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mstomaso"},"dateCreated":"2007-05-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fans! - Don't let your expectations run away with you! Sit back and enjoy!","reviewBody":"Venom, Green Goblin 3 and Sandman.

Spiderman 3 reworks these three epic story arcs into a single feature length film. Impossible? Well... some of the reviewers here on IMDb seem to agree. I, however, do not. I went into this film with some trepidation and reasonable expectations. The Venom saga has been, since it first appeared in print, one of my all-time favorite multiple issue story arcs in comics. How this story could be made into a film following in the somewhat less weighty footsteps of Spiderman and Spiderman 2 was hard to imagine. The film did justice to the story-line - keeping almost all of its dark thematic content, while modifying its plot points and reducing its heavy depressive tone in order to keep the film entertaining and fast-paced. But don't expect this to be the same lengthy exploration that the comics provide.

Sam and Ivan Raimi can add this to their long list of satisfying films.

Briefly, Spiderman is having his normal share of growing pains. His love for MJ is now matched by his self-absorption and his addiction to heroism. Of course Harry still wants to kill him to avenge his father's death, and somewhere out there is his uncle's killer - who is about to become The Sandman. Just as things really start to fall apart, his costume turns black and develops a sinister aspect. He becomes more powerful, more ruthless, and a more conflicted being than the hero he had been. And Peter even dons black eye liner and a decidedly emo haircut. Unlike most recent comic book adaptations on the big screen, the story (to this point) offers plenty of room for humor, which Raimi could never pass up. J. J. Jameson and Bruce Campbell's excellent cameo are pure comedic relief from the somewhat heavy subject matter that seems immanent throughout this film. You'll laugh... you'll cry... You'll fall in love, if you can handle a new take on the classic Venom tale, with some worthwhile additions.

Things go from bad but kind of funny to worse and pretty serious. The film explores emotions more than any superhero film I have thus far seen - with the possible exception of the original Punisher. It nicely studies Spidey's humanity, ego, fallibility, and his previously unexplored dark side, and forces our hero to confront all three both symbolically and physically in order to redeem himself.

Tobey Maguire turns in his best Spidey performance yet, and is excellently supported by Kirsten Dunst and Rosemary Harris. James Franco turns in a great interpretation of Harry - much needed for this story-line. This cinematography is more wide-open and hyperbolic than the previous Raimi Spiderman films - as one would expect given the storyline. It is not surprising that the film went a little beyond the pale in terms of special effects - again unavoidable given the subject matter. But the CGI did become a little distracting towards the end.

I have read a lot of disappointed reviews of this film, but honestly, I found much to praise and very little to complain about. Highly recommended especially for Venom fans.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":523471,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2007-05-01","keywords":"villain,peter parker character,alien parasite,alien symbiote,coffeeshop","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Spider-Man 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi826343961","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGYzNWJlMDEtM2MwOS00NTA3LThjMWItYmIzZjQ0MzI4MDFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGYzNWJlMDEtM2MwOS00NTA3LThjMWItYmIzZjQ0MzI4MDFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for this third installment in the superhero film series"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001497/","name":"Tobey Maguire"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000379/","name":"Kirsten Dunst"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0333410/","name":"Topher Grace"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000600/","name":"Sam Raimi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051941/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095403/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000600/","name":"Sam Raimi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0706898/","name":"Ivan Raimi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0765091/","name":"Alvin Sargent"}],"duration":"PT2H19M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
Bilo jednom u Meksiku
programme.desc:
Once Upon a Time in Mexico: Directed by Robert Rodriguez. With Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Johnny Depp, Mickey Rourke. Hitman "El Mariachi" becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0285823/","name":"Once Upon a Time in Mexico","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5MDg5OTcwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjI1MTIzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Hitman "El Mariachi" becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0285823/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bob the moo"},"dateCreated":"2003-09-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sporadically enjoyable but the plot is a total shambles","reviewBody":"El Mariachi has long quit the gunslinger trade but is offered a chance to avenge the death of his wife and daughter by slightly unhinged CIA agent Sands. Sands is trying to control a coup by allowing it to happy but then having the victor killed as soon as he takes power. However the involvement of drug lord Barillo and various other groups soon complicate matters causing bullets to come from all sides.

After taking an unlikely trilogy to box office success, Rodriguez returns to the film series that basically brought him the success he has today  El Mariachi. While the first film in the series was a very cheap movie, the second and the third swelled with budget and star names. Here the action is constant and is very stylised. This is not to say that it is all edge of the seat stuff, but if spectacle and bangs is all you are after then this should do the job nicely. None of it moves slowly simply because it has more than enough going on to fill the time  but that's the problem to be honest.

The plot has so much going on but none of it actually fits together or makes a whole lot of sense. After a while any attempt to put things together in my head became a wasted effort  clearly the point here was that the style and gloss was meant to be everything. The other downside to this is that some characters are so poorly used that it's a wonder as to why they were even written in. Some cameos are fantastic and make the film. I refer to, of course, Depp, who, for the second time this summer, manages to make a film better by his sheer witty performance. He owes a lot to the writing of the character but he carries him off superbly and is darkly funny. However Rouke, Blades, Mendes, Dafoe all have little to do and, with some of them, are just clutter. Banderas does his usual stuff with style but his character doesn't have the depth that the flashbacks I think are meant to give him  again this is style over substance.

I still quite enjoyed the film but couldn't help but feel it was less the sum of it's parts. With a budget, big names and lots of action I was surprised that the cluttered, shambolic plot managed to take away from the `fun' as much as it did  but it did. Quite enjoyable but you need a LOT of style to win compensate for the total lack of substance."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":157279,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2003-12-17","keywords":"mexico,bikini,outnumbered,mariachi,playing electric guitar","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Once Upon a Time in Mexico","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi813540889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmRkNzMzZjItZTllOS00MmMwLWJmYzYtOGFiMWVjODMyNjUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmRkNzMzZjItZTllOS00MmMwLWJmYzYtOGFiMWVjODMyNjUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Once Upon a Time in Mexico"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000104/","name":"Antonio Banderas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000161/","name":"Salma Hayek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000136/","name":"Johnny Depp"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001675/","name":"Robert Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035848/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001675/","name":"Robert Rodriguez"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

Resident Evil: Retribution: Directed by Paul W.S. Anderson. With Milla Jovovich, Sienna Guillory, Michelle Rodriguez, Aryana Engineer. Alice fights alongside a resistance movement to regain her freedom from an Umbrella Corporation testing facility." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1855325/","name":"Resident Evil: Retribution","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY0NjcwMWMtN2MyNC00ZmZjLWEwZTAtM2ExYWE1NDUwNWQyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Alice fights alongside a resistance movement to regain her freedom from an Umbrella Corporation testing facility.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1855325/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"stevemontebello"},"dateCreated":"2012-09-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"A waste of my theater going dollars","reviewBody":"I have enjoyed previous installments of this franchise and went to see this most recent entry in 3D. Not having seen anything in the new 3D format I felt this action movie would be the one to showcase this technology. I was wrong. I found the 3D effects were most prominent on the periphery of the screen and distracted from the foreground action.

As far as the film itself, little plot development to the franchise theme, pretty vapid dialog (when there is any dialog)and no character development. 

I enjoy action movies but can do without 90 minutes of frenetic action that does not really forward a story.

Hollywood - Please return to story telling without all the unnecessary gimmicks.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":136967,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2012-09-14","keywords":"zombie,umbrella,corporation,rescue,fight","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3931415065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxMDk3MDA0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjM5MzQ5Nw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxMDk3MDA0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjM5MzQ5Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Alice fights alongside a resistance movement in the continuing battle against the Umbrella Corporation and the undead.

programme.title: Vdekje ne Tombston
programme.desc: Danny Trejo, Mickey Rourke. Pasi vritet nga shokët, një i jashtëligjshëm bën një marrëveshje me djallin që të ringjallet dhe në këmbim të hakmarrjes të dorëzojë në ferr shpirtrat e tyre...
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Gara e Vdekjes 3: Ferri
programme.desc: Luke Goss, Tanit Phoenix. Gara më vdekjeprurëse në botë, këtë herë zhvillohet ne shkretëtirat e Afrikës së Jugut. Karl Lukas, shoferi i burgosur më i talentuar, është vetëm një fitore larg lirisë së tij dhe skuadrës që e ndihmon...
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Tron 2: Trashëgimia
programme.desc: Jeff Bridges. Sam, ende vuan zhdukjen e babait, i cili ishte një gjeni në zhvillimin e video lojërave. Por kur Sam, heton nje sinjal të çuditshëm, ai e gjen veten brenda lojës së shpikur nga babai i tij.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Perandoresha dhe Luftëtarët
programme.desc: Pas vdekjes së babait, një grua detyrohet të bëhet perandoreshë dhe me ndihmën e luftëtarëve të saj trima, të mbrojë kombin që rrezikohet nga një luftë e përgjakshme...
programme.category: Kinemaja Aziatike

programme.title: Hakmarrja e Xhejnit
programme.desc: Natalie Portman, Joel Edgerton. Në 'Perëndimin e Egër', nje grua kërkon ndihmën e ish të dashurit të saj për të mbrojtur bashkëshortin e plagosur nga një bandë vrasësish....
programme.category: Western
aksion

programme.title: Rebeli
programme.desc: B.Willis. Një vrasës serial rikthehet për të persekutuar dedektivin që u vu në gjurmët e tij vite më parë. Tom Hardi, i shkarkuar nga detyra tani patrullon ujërat e 3 lumenjve duke zbuluar një seri kufomash, të gjitha femra qe i njihte.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Përtej ligjit
programme.desc: 2019. Steven Seagal. Kur një ish polic mëson për vdekjen e te birit në stil ekzekutimi, ai rikthehet rrugëve të errëta të qytetit. I armatosur, i rrezikshëm dhe me asgjë për të humbur, ai kërkon hakmarrje.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Fati i një faraoni: Pjesa e dyte
programme.desc: Ben Kingsley, Avan Jogia. Historia e vërtetë e faraonit më të ri të Egjiptit, Tutankhamun.
programme.category: Biografi
historik

programme.title: Star Trek II:Zemërimi i Khanit
programme.desc: Kapiteni Kirk, niset në një mision në dukje të lehtë. Por përballja me Khan-in, një armik i vjetër, i cili kërkon hakmarrje për vdekjen e të birit, do të rrezikojë jo vetëm jetën e kapitenit, por edhe shkatërrimin e gjithë botës.
programme.category: Fantashkencë

programme.title: Divergjentja
programme.desc: Në një botë te ndarë bazuar tek virtytet, Trisi mëson se është Divergjente dhe nuk përshtatet. Kur zbulon një plan për të shkatërruar Divergjentët, Trisi duhet të zbulojë se çfarë i bën të rrezikshëm ata.
programme.category: Aventurë
fantashkencë

programme.title: Diamantët e kuq
programme.desc: Mark-Paul Gosselaar, Claire Forlani, Bruce Willis. Pas nje vjedhjeje shumë fitimprurëse që nuk shkon sipas planit, një grabitës profesionist dhe ish e dashura e tij, vihen nën shënjestrën e një krimineli të pushtetshëm...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Labirinti - Vrapo ose vdis
programme.desc: Dylan O'Brien, Aml Ameen. Kur Tomasi, nje djalë i ri zgjohet brenda një labrinti vdekjepruës, ai nuk mban mend asgjë përveçse disa ëndrrave të çuditshme. Tani ai duhet të përpiqet të zbulojë të vërtetën dhe të dalë gjallë prej aty...
programme.category: Aksion
thriller
fantashkencë

programme.title: Muri i Madh
programme.desc: 2016.Matt Damon, Tian Jing, Willem Dafoe. Dy mercenarë në kërim të barutit, e gjejnë veten të përfshirë në mbrojtjen e 'Murit të Madh' në Kinë që po sulmohet nga ushtri gjigante përbindëshish.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Zonja Luftetare
programme.desc: 2016. Një vajzë e re amerikane udhëton përmes botës së errët të Hong Kongut për të marrë pjesë në një turne elitar femrash. Tek fiton çdo raund, ajo afrohet më shumë ose me titullin si luftëtarja më e mirë në botë, ose me vdekjen.
programme.category: Aksion
arte marciale

programme.title: Një hirushe në Mumbai
programme.desc: Një e grua e re e ve punësohet si shërbyese në shtëpinë e një arkitekti të pasur, por sa më e fortë bëhet tërheqja midis tyre, aq më të fuqishme tregohen rregullat shoqërore që i përçajnë...
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Kalorësi i parë
programme.desc: Richard Gere, Julia Ormond, Sean Connery. Me forcën e shpatës, Lançeloti i rri besnik mbretit Artur. Rastësia e bën të njihet me Gjenevrën, nusen e ardhshme të mbretit. Beteja më e madhe është për të fituar dashurinë e saj.
programme.category: Epik
dramë
romancë

programme.title: Sheqer kafeje
programme.desc: Taye Diggs, Sanaa Lathan. Një kritike muzike dhe një producent, miq që në fëmijëri ia dedikojnë suksesin e tyre zbulimit të Hip Hop-it, por tani edhe pse secili ka një lidhje, simpatia për njëri tjetrin po i afron gjithnjë e më shumë.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Rregullat e lojës
programme.desc: Eric Bana, Drew Barrymore, Robert Duvall. Një lojtar pokeri, i cili po përgatitet për kampionatin më të rëndësishëm të jetës, përpiqet të balancojë karrierën, romancën e sapo krijuar dhe marrëdhënien e ndërlikuar me babain e tij...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Në kërkim të folesë
programme.desc: John Krasinski, Maya Rudolph. Aventura e një çifti që mbas shumë vitesh, vendosin të kenë një fëmijë dhe vihen në kërkim për të gjetur vendin e duhur për ta rritur...
programme.category: Portret familjar

programme.title: Në rini
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Naomi Watts. Ndërkohë që përballen me ndryshimet që vijnë me moshën e mesme, jeta dhe karriera e një producenti dokumentarësh dhe gruas së tij, do të ripërtërihet nga takimi me një çift rreth të 25-ave...
programme.category: Dramë
komedi

programme.title: Duel rivalësh
programme.desc: Daniel Bruhl, Chris Hemsworth. Nga regjisori fitues i 2 çmimeve Oskar Ron Howard. Historia e vërtetë e rivalitetit legjendar në Formula 1, midis pilotit anglez James Hunt dhe kundërshtarit të tij austriak Niki Lauda.
programme.category: Dramë
biografi
sport

programme.title: Pesëdhjetë hijet e Greit
programme.desc: 2015. Fenomeni mbarëbotëror Pesëdhjetë hijet e Greit, në një ekranizim mjaft të suksesshëm nën interpretimin e shkëlqyer të Dakota Johnson dhe Jamie Dornan.
programme.category: Romancë
erotik

programme.title: Dhuruesi
programme.desc: Brenton Thwaites, Jeff Bridges, Meryl Streep. Në një botë pa luftra, pa vuajtje, pa emocione, një djalë i ri përzgjidhet që të mësojë nga 'Dhuruesi' se cfarë është kënaqësia dhe dhimbja e 'botës së vërtetë'...
programme.category: Drame
Fantashkencë

programme.title: Pa kushte
programme.desc: Frymëzuar nga ngjarje e vërtetë. Jeta idilike e një gruaje shkatërrohet kur bashkëshorti vritet nga një akt dhune i pakuptimtë. Ndërsa përgatitet të vendosë vetë drejtësi, dy takime të papritura do t'ia ndryshojnë sërish jetën.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Drita mes oqeanesh
programme.desc: 2016. Michael Fassbender, Alicia Vikander, Rachel Weisz. Kur kujdestari i një fari në një ishull dhe gruaja e tij gjejnë një fëmijë brenda një varke në breg, ata vihen përballë një dileme që pushton botën e tyre dhe të një gruaje të panjohur.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Beqare në Majemi
programme.desc: Amy, një vajzë e re tërheqëse dhe beqare, e prirur për të vlerësuar me shumë paratë se dashurinë në një lidhje, bie viktime e botës materialiste të Majemit.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Clover Field
programme.desc: Mike Vogel, Jessica Lukas. Gjatë një feste surprizë të përgatitur për Robin, një përbindësh i tmerrshëm sulmon Nju Jorkun. I gjithë filmi është i parë përmes kameras amatore të njërit prej miqve të tij.
programme.category: Apokalips-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Rrugë e vështirë
programme.desc: Adam Carolla, David Alan Grier, Jay Mohr. Pas një divorci të shtrenjtë dhe mbylljes së programit të tij televiziv, një komedian detyrohet të interpretojë në vende që as nuk i kishte menduar.
programme.category: Dramë-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Mbyllja e rrethit
programme.desc: Shirley MacLaine, Christopher Plummer. Në 1943, një artiljer duke dhënë shpirt, i jep një vendasi një unazë për t'ia dorëzuar të dashurës në SHBA. Pesëdhjetë vjet më vonë, një burrë e gjen unazën dhe vendos të zbulojë historinë e saj...
programme.category: Sub. Ang

programme.title: Dita e dëshmorëve
programme.desc: Jonathan Bennett, James Cromwell. Në moshën 13 vjeçare, Kajl dëgjon nga gjyshi tre histori për pjesëmarrjen e tij në Luftën e Dytë Botërore. Tani që ai vetë është ushtar, eksperiencat e tij në luftë janë thuajse të njëjtat.
programme.category: Luftë-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Djali i Rambos
programme.desc: Dy djem do të vendosin të bëjnë filmin më të jashtëzakonshëm në histori dhe do të bëhen të famshëm pavarësisht nga frika e prindërve, por një ditë do të ndeshen me nxënësin e ardhur nga franca, Didierin dhe gjithcka do të marrë të tatëpjetën.
programme.category: Aventurë-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Kokë e këmbë në dashuri
programme.desc: Monica Potter. Një vajzë e re bie në dashuri me një djalë pavaresisht se mendon se ai është përfshire në një vrasje. Titra shqip-anglisht.
programme.category: Komedi-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Dredd-Ligji jam unë
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone, Armand Assante, Diane Lane, Rob Schneider. Në botën e së ardhmes, gjykatësi më i famshëm dënohet për një krim që s'e ka kryer, ndërsa homologu i tij vrasës shpeton pa u lagur. Titra shqip-anglisht.
programme.category: Aksion-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Gol 2 - Të jetosh ëndrrën
programme.desc: K.Becker. Santiago Munez, ylli i Newcastle United arrin superyjet, dhe ëndrrën e çdo futbollisti, kur transferohet tek Real Madridi për të luajtur përkrah Beckham, Zidane, Raul dhe Cassillas. Por medalja e lavdisë ka edhe anën tjetër.
programme.category: SportLife

programme.title: Djalli vishet me Prada
programme.desc: Anne Hathaway, Meryl Streep, Emily Blunt. Një vajzë e re që sapo ka mbaruar universitetin, fillon punë një një revistë prestigjoze mode, si asistentja e drejtueses më të suksesshme dhe më të tmerrshme në Nju Jork.
programme.category: Drane
komedi-Sub.Ang

programme.title: Tradhtari mes nesh
programme.desc: Michael Douglas, Kiefer Sutherland. Agjenti sekret Pete Garrison, shefi i truprojave të Zonjes së Pare Amerikane do të dyshohet se ka gisht në vrasjen e kolegut të tij dhe se është truri i komplotit për asgjësimin e presidentit të SHBA. Titra shqip-a.
programme.category: Thriller-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Ujëvara Serafim
programme.desc: P.Brosnan, L.Neeson. Lufta civile ka mbaruar por Karveri, kolonel i ushtrisë federale, ka edhe një mision të fundit: të vrasë një farë Gidoni me çdo kusht. Hakmarrja dhe tërbimi do t'i çojë ata të dy në skutat gjakësore të shpirtit të secilit.
programme.category: Western night-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Vëllezër bari
programme.desc: Edward Norton, Keri Russell, Richard Dreyfuss. Një profesor në një nga universitetet më të mirë, rikthehet në qytezën e lindjes, ku vëllai i tij binjak, një rritës marijuhane ka thurur një plan për të rrënuar një shitës droge të zonës.
programme.category: Dramë-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Transportuesi
programme.desc: J.Statham. Frenku është një ish agjent special qe tashmë merret me transport mallrash ilegale. Porosia e radhës s'ndryshon nga të tjerat, por rrugës'"pakoja' nis të lëvizë. Duke thyer rregullat, ai e hap çantën dhe zbulon një bukuroshe të lidhur.
programme.category: Aksion-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Margaret
programme.desc: Anna Paquin, Matt Damon. Një vajzë e re, bëhet dëshmitare e një aksidenti tragjik dhe ndjehet përgjegjëse. Kjo ndjenjë faji, do të pushtojë gjithë jetën e saj dhe do të prekë edhe të gjithë njerëzit që ajo njeh...
programme.category: Dramë-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Antebellum
programme.desc: Janelle Monáe. Një thriller provokues nga producentët e suksesshëm të 'Get out'. Shkrimtarja e njohur afro-amerikane, Veronika Henlei e gjen veten të zhytur në një realitet të tmerrshëm, i cili e detyron të përballet me të kaluarën, të tashmen dhe të ardh.
programme.category: Thriller
dramë

programme.title: Mike gjaku
programme.desc: Olivia Cooke, Anya Taylor-Joy. Dy adoleshente të shtresës së lartë rilidhin miqësi pasi shumë vitesh larg njëra-tjtrës. Sëbashku thurin një plan për të zgjidhur problemet e tyre, të cilin do ta zbatojnë pavarësisht kostove.
programme.category: Komedi e zezë
thriller

programme.title: Përpara Krishtlindjes
programme.desc: Eloise Mumford, Michael Stahl-David. E përballur me një zgjedhje shumë të vështirë, një vajzë merr pak ndihmë në prag të Krishtlindjes, duke u transportuar 3 vite para në kohë, për të parë si do të jetë jeta.
programme.category: Romancë
fantazi

programme.title: Edi Shqiponja
programme.desc: Taron Egerton, Hugh Jackman. Historia e vërtetë e skiatorit britanik Eddie Edwards, i cili nuk hoqi dorë kurrë edhe kur thuajse askush nuk e mbështeste, për të arritur në 'Lojërat Olimpike Dimërore' të vitit 1988...
programme.category: Biografi
komedi
sport

programme.title: Fundi i një rrugëtimi
programme.desc: Lufta I Botërore. Historia e një grupi ushtarësh britanikë, të udhëhequr nga kapiteni Stanhope, i lodhur mendërisht nga lufta. Ata do të luftojnë në vijë të parë kundër forcave gjermane dhe janë në pritje të sulmit dhe fatit të tyre.
programme.category: Dramë
luftë

programme.title: Tradhtari ideal
programme.desc: Ewan McGregor, Naomie Harris. Një çift, bëhet pjesë e planit të një mafiozi rus për të tradhtuar dhe e gjen veten midis mafies ruse dhe shërbimit të inteligjencës angleze MI5.
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Përgjithmonë miq

programme.category: Komedi
dramë

programme.title: Sekreti i senatorit Kenedi
programme.desc: Jason Clarke, Kate Mara. Historia tragjike e aksidentit të '69-ës, ku u përfshi Senatori Ted Kennedy dhe 1 vajzë që punonte në fushatën elektorale, e cila humbi jetën. Ai u largua nga vendngjarja dhe lajmëroi policinë vetëm pas 10 orësh...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Si macja në autostradë
programme.desc: Paola Cortellesi, Antonio Albanese. Një pasanik dhe një grua e zakonshme, janë të detyruar të bashkëpunojnë, për shkak të fëmijëve që kanë rënë në dashuri.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Zemërimi i një burri
programme.desc: Jason Statham. Roja i ri i sigurisë në një kompani transporti parash, befason kolegët kur shpalos aftësitë e tij të mprehta me armë, gjatë një sulmi nga grabitës me përvojë. Kush është ai në të vërtetë?
programme.category: Aksion
Thriller

programme.title: Mjeshtri i parasë
programme.desc: George Clooney, Julia Roberts. Drejtpërdrejt në televizion me programin e tyre 'Mjeshtri i parasë', drejtuesi Li Gejts dhe producentja Pati Fen, përballen me një situatë të rrezikshme kur merren peng nga një njeri që ka humbur gjithçka.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Niveli Bos
programme.desc: Frank Grillo, Mel Gibson, Naomi Watts. Ish agjenti i Forcave Speciale, Roi Pulver jeton çdo ditë ditën e tij të vdekjes. I bllokuar në një lak kohor që përfundon me vrasjen e tij, Roi zbulon se është pjesë e një eksperimenti të fshehtë qeveritar...
programme.category: Aksion
Fantashkencë

programme.title: Henku dhe Asha
programme.desc: Një studente indiane në Prage dhe një njujorkez i vetmuar komunikojne duke i dërguar njëri-tjetrit videomesazhe. Korrespondenca e pazakontë thellon lidhjen e tyre dhe ata duhet të vendosin nëse ka ardhur momenti të takohen.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Si zogu në kafaz
programme.desc: Mel Gibson, Goldie Hawn. Një natë të bukur pas 15 vjetësh Merien Greivs zbulon se dashuria e saj e dikurshme... në të vërtetë s'kishte vdekur. Tani atyre u duhet të rifitojnë kohën e humbur, dhe t'u shpëtojnë disa tipave të rrezikshëm.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Në arrati me një idiot
programme.desc: Gérard Lanvinm Benoît Poelvoorde. Pasi fiton lotarinë, një i burgosur arratiset dhe me vete merr një nga rojet e burgut jo dhe aq i zgjuar. Në përpjekje për të gjetur biletën fituese ne Afrikë, ata kalojnë një aventurë të paparë.
programme.category: Komedi/Aventurë

programme.title: Banda e babagjyshëve
programme.desc: Aldo, Giovanni e Giacomo, sjellin komedinë e tyre më të fundit. Këtë herë, gjatë festave të fundvitit të veshur si babagjyshë, ata akuzohen gabimisht si një bandë grabitësish dhe kalojnë një aventurë, që s'kanë për ta harruar kurrë.
programme.category: Aldo
Giovanni e Giacomo

programme.title: Dashuri dhe muzikë
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2008. Nik, pjestar i një grupi muzikor, nuk ia thotë fare nga romanca. Por njohja me Norën, një vajzë e re që kërkon të bëhet e dashura e tij për 5 minuta, do të sjellë një natë, që mund të ndryshojë gjithçka...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Njeriu që thotë vetëm po
programme.desc: Jim Carrey, Zooey Deschanel. Një njeri merr pjesë në një program të bazuar mbi një parim të thjeshtë: T'i thuash 'Po' .gjithçkaje .gjithmonë. Fuqia e 'Po-së' do të ndryshojë gjithçka në jetën e tij profesionale, por edhe atë sentimentale.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Hitch
programme.desc: W.Smith. Nëse shkon në Nju Jork duhet të takosh se s'bën Hiçin. Ai është mblesi më i famshëm. Ai të gjen vajzën e ëndrrave. Sara Melasit, gazetares i ka shkrepur në kokë të zbuloje legjendën e doktorit-mbles dhe do të kapet mat!
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Vafsh në djall, Gëte
programme.desc: Elyas M'Barek, Karoline Herfurth. Një ish i burgosur punësohet në një shkollë ku janë fshehur paratë nga grabitja e tij e fundit.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: 40 vjeçari i virgjër
programme.desc: Steve Carell, Catherine Keener. 40 vjeçari Andy Stitzer kishte bërë plot gjëra në jete. Kishte një punë të mirë; një apartament të lezetshëm; kishte shokë e miq. Vetëm një gjë s'kish bërë deri tani...s'kish bërë kurrë seks.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Klubi i librit
programme.desc: 2018. Diane Keaton, Jane Fonda, Candice Bergen, Mary Steenburgen. Jetët e katër mikeshave të vjetra kthehen përmbys pasi lexojnë librin e shumëpërfolur '50 hijet e Greit' në klubin e tyre të librit...
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Ajo është tepër për mua
programme.desc: Jay Baruchel, Alice Eve. Një djalë i zakonshëm takon vajzën e ëndrrave; inteligjente, e rafinuar dhe shumë e bukur. Por mungesa e besimit në vetvete i hap një sërë telashesh e do ta bëjë të mendojë... "Ajo është tepër për mua!".
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Mes dy Fierësh: Filmi
programme.desc: I armatosur me pyetje ngacmuese dhe aspak profesoniste, komediani Zach Galifianakis niset për të intervistuar njerëz të fashmëm të profilit të lartë, për të vënë në vend reputacionin e tij dhe të shfaqes me buxhet të ulët që ai drejton.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Korbi
programme.desc: 2012. John Cusack, Luke Evans. Shek. i 19-të, Baltimorë. Një hetues i ri, i kërkon ndihmë shkrimtarit Edgar Allan Poe, për të kapur një vrasësi të pashpirt, i cili masakrimet e tij i bazon në veprat e shkrimtarit Poe...
programme.category: Thriller-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Fabrikantët e fëmijëve
programme.desc: Paul Schneider, Olivia Munn. Tentativat dhe përpjekjet deri në aventura ekstreme, e një çifti për tu bërë me fëmijë...Titra shqip-anglisht.
programme.category: Komedi-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Kur të zgjohet
programme.desc: 2019. Pas vdekjes aksidentale të të birit, një nënë dhe vajza e saj, të cilat po përjetojnë hidhërimin e pangushëllueshëm, fillojnë të vuajnë nga ndërprerje të shpeshta dhe frikshme të gjumit...
programme.category: Horror
thriller

programme.title: Një gozhdë
programme.desc: Jason Ritter, Jake Sandvig. Dy miq të pandarë rreth të 25-ave, por që sillen ende si adoleshentë, mësojnë mbi përgjegjësinë kur fillojnë të kujdesen për një fëmijë të braktisur nga fqinja e tyre...
programme.category: Dramë-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Shkruar dashuri në krahët e saj
programme.desc: Kat Dennings, Chad M.Murray. Bazuar në një histori të vërtetë, që filloi një lëvizje globale! Një vajzë adoleshente e varur nga droga gjen forcën të futet në rrugën e rikuperimit edhe krijon një fondacion që ka ndihmuar mijëra njerëz...
programme.category: Dramë -Sub. Ang

programme.title: Zemërdragoi 4: Beteja për Zemren e zjarr
programme.desc: Pasi 'Zemra e Dragoit', burimi i fuqisë për një dragua të quajtur Drago vidhet nga vikinget, ai duhet të bindë një vëlla e motër që të lënë mënjanë rivalitetin mes tyre dhe të bashkojnë forcat për të mbrojtur mbretërinë.
programme.category: Fantazi
aventurë-Sub.Ang

programme.title: Kolosi
programme.desc: Anne Hathaway. Pasi humbet punën dhe ndahet nga i dashuri, Gloria rikthehet në qytezën e lindjes. Kur lajmet fillojnë të shfaqin imazhet e një përbindëshi gjigant që po shkatërron Korenë e Jugut, ajo kupton që lëvizjet e përbindëshit kontrollohen ng.
programme.category: Fantashkencë-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Histori policie: Të vendosësh ligjin
programme.desc: Jackie Chan, Ye Liu. Një njeri që kërkon lirimin e një të burgosuri, merr peng një shef policie, vajzën e tij dhe një grup të panjohurish.
programme.category: Kinemaja Aziatike-Sub.Ang

programme.title: Nata e fundit e njerëzimit
programme.desc: Emile Hirsch, Olivia Thirlby. Njerëzimi po sulmhet nga një race jashtëtokësore dhe rrezikon shfarrosjen. Ndërkohë që qeniet e padukshme përpijnë gjithçka, pesë të rinj mundohen të gjejnë një zgjidhje përpara se të jetë shumë vonë.

programme.title: Personi i tretë
programme.desc: Liam Neeson, Mila Kunis. 3 histori dashurie, pasioni, besimi dhe tradhtie. Ngjarjet zhvillohen në Nju Jork, Paris dhe Romë, përmes 3 çifteve që nuk njihen, por historitë e tyre ndërthuren dhe ndajnë shumë të përbashkëta...
programme.category: Romancë-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Kodi Momentum
programme.desc: Olga Kurylenko, James Purefoy. Pasi identiteti i saj i vërtetë zbulohet gjatë vjedhjes së disa diamantëve, një eksperte e misioneve të fshehta vihet nën shënjestrën e një vrasësi profesionist...

programme.title: Legjendat e krimit
programme.desc: Tom Hardy. Historia e vërtetë e binjakëve Rexhi dhe Roni Krei, 2 nga kriminelët më të famshëm në historinë e Britanisë, të cilët në Londrën e viteve 1960, arritën të krijonin një perandori kriminale...

romancë-Sub.Ang

programme.title: I përzgjedhuri
programme.desc: Keri Russell. Jeta e qetë e një familjeje, merr një kthesë të frikshme, kur atyre fillojnë t'i ndodhin fenomene të pashpjegueshme... Të përzgjedhur nga një forcë vdekjeprurëse, ata duhet të bëjnë gjithçka për të shpëtuar...
programme.category: Sub. Ang

programme.title: Abraham Linkolni: Gjahtari i vampireve
programme.desc: Benjamin Walker, Dominic Cooper. Historia fiktive e jetës sekrete së presidentit të 16-të të Amerikës. Abraham Lincoln, rrezikon çdo gjë, në përpjekje për të ndalur vampirët gjakpirës, të cilët kanë në plan të krijojnë kombin e tyre...
programme.category: Sub. Ang

programme.title: Kur të zgjohet
programme.desc: 2019. Pas vdekjes aksidentale të të birit, një nënë dhe vajza e saj, të cilat po përjetojnë hidhërimin e pangushëllueshëm, fillojnë të vuajnë nga ndërprerje të shpeshta dhe frikshme të gjumit...

programme.title: Fëmijët
programme.desc: Pushimet e shumëpritura kthehen në një makth të vërtetë për mbijetesë, kur fëmijët fillojnë të masakrojnë prindërit e tyre në mënyra të tmerrshme.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: 1998. Jean Reno, Michael Lerner. Ndikuar nga rrezatimi i disa eksperimenteve bërthamore, Godzilla, ky përbindësh gjigand do të terrorizoje botën mbarë. A do t'ia dalë mbanë e gjithe ushtria amerikane ta mposhtë?

programme.title: Droni
programme.desc: Sean Bean. Një njeri familjar punon në fshehtësi si pilot droni, duke kyer misione vdekjeprurëse nga rehatia e qytezës së tij. Kur një biznesmen pakistanez i shfaqet në derën e shtëpisë, ai detyrohet të përballë pasojat e veprimeve të tij.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Kat Benk
programme.desc: 2014. Liam Hemsworth, Teresa Palmer. Pasi bëhen dëshimtarë të një vrasjeje, jeta e një të riu dhe të dashurës së tij merr një kthesë të rrezikshme...
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Kajaki
programme.desc: David Elliot, Mark Stanley. Gjatë luftës së Afganistanit, disa ushtarë britanikë që po patrullojnë digën Kajaki, përballen me një makth të tmerrshëm. Një fushë të minuar që mund të të kushtojë gjymtyrët - ose jetën.
programme.category: Histori e vërtetë

programme.title: Rënie e Lirë
programme.desc: Sarah Butler, D.B. Sweeney. Pasi zbulon një sekret të rrezikshëm, një punonjëse e një korporate të madhe, vihet në shënjestër nga një vrasës profesionist dhe bllokohet në ashensor, ku shpëtimi i vetëm mund të jetë rënia e lirë.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Shtatë motrat
programme.desc: 2017. Në një botë ku familjet detyrohen të lindin vetëm një fëmijë, shtatë binjake identike përpiqen të mos zbulohen nga qeveria, ndërsa hetojnë zhdukjen e njërës prej tyre.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
thriller

programme.title: Në shtegun e hakmarrjes
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins, Julia Stiles, Ray Liotta. Një vajzë e re, bind dy njerëz që t'i bashkohen misionit të saj për hakmarrje ndaj një ish-polici që e përndjek.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Tau
programme.desc: 2018. Një grua e re mbahet peng nga një shkencëtar në një shtëpi të kontrolluar nga një inteligjencë artificiale. Shpresa e saj e vetme për të shpëtuar, është që të bëjë të arsyetojë programin e krijuar për ta mbajtur brenda, ta lërë atë lirë.
programme.category: Thriller
fantashkencë

programme.title: Viti 1922
programme.desc: Bazuar në romanin e Stephen King. Në vitin 1922, një fermer i thjeshtë, por krenar, komploton të vrasë bashkëshorten dhe bind të birin adoleshent për ta ndihmuar. Veprimet e tyre shoqërohen me pasoja të paimagjinueshme.
programme.category: Horror
krim

programme.title: Libri i shenjtë
programme.desc: Denzel Washington, Gary Oldman. Një hero në një botë post-apokaliptike, në një udhëtim epik përmes Amerikës në mbrojtje të një libri të shenjtë ku shkruhen sekretet për shpëtimin e të gjithë racës njerëzore...
programme.category: Aventurë

programme.title: Nata e hënës së përgjakur
programme.desc: Dy grupe rivale njerëzish-ujq, një që jeton duke gjuajtur dhe vrarë dhe tjetri që jeton në paqe me shoqerinë, përballen për fatin e një 13-vjeçari, i cili ka në dorë përmbushjen e një profecie të lashtë dhe fatin e tyre.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Pakti djallëzor
programme.desc: Kur një nënë mëson se vajza e saj e ka vdekjen të pashmangshme, pranon të bëjë një pakt të dëshpëruar për ta shpëtuar. Pasi e bija i shpëton fatit, e ëma nis udhëtimi e saj drejt ferrit...
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Unstoppable
Nezaustavljiv
programme.desc: Unstoppable: Directed by Tony Scott. With Denzel Washington, Chris Pine, Rosario Dawson, Ethan Suplee. With an unmanned, half-mile-long freight train barreling toward a city, a veteran engineer and a young conductor race against the clock to prevent a catastrophe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0477080/","name":"Unstoppable","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI4NDQwMDM0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzY1ODMwNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"With an unmanned, half-mile-long freight train barreling toward a city, a veteran engineer and a young conductor race against the clock to prevent a catastrophe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0477080/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bobkuhl"},"dateCreated":"2013-10-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Top of the line feel-good action thriller that stays on the rails and doesn't go off track","reviewBody":"This is an excellent movie in almost all respects. The cast does a very good job. The two leads play off of each other very well together and project good chemistry. The supporting cast is good as well and the movie even does a good job with providing some character depth (to the extent you can in this type of movie)- you do wind up rooting for them. The director has taken a good story, and matched it with excellent, I mean excellent, cinematography and takes us an every faster roller coaster ride. The movie is well paced, it keeps you engaged from the start & doesn't let you go until its over, and was just a lot of fun to watch. I highly recommend it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":190763,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2010-11-10","keywords":"train,runaway train,train engineer,freight train,train movie","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Unstoppable: Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3068790297","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzNDI1OTk1Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDg1NDYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzNDI1OTk1Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDg1NDYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A rail company frantically works to prevent an unmanned, half-mile-long freight train carrying combustible liquids and poisonous gas from wiping out a city."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1517976/","name":"Chris Pine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0206257/","name":"Rosario Dawson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001716/","name":"Tony Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0276484/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0093560/","name":"Mark Bomback"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dan in Real Life
Danova prava ljubav
programme.desc:
Dan in Real Life: Directed by Peter Hedges. With Steve Carell, Juliette Binoche, Dane Cook, Alison Pill. A widower finds out the woman he fell in love with is his brother's girlfriend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0480242/","name":"Dan in Real Life","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA2Nzc1NzQ1OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTE0MDE1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A widower finds out the woman he fell in love with is his brother's girlfriend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0480242/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"seawalker"},"dateCreated":"2008-01-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not massively original, but it is entertaining","reviewBody":"Steve Carell plays Dan Burns, newspaper agony uncle and dedicated single father to three girls. At a large family homecoming Dan meets his perfect woman, only to find out that she is in a relationship with his brother.

What's a man to do?

I rather liked "Dan In Real Life", but I would imagine the success or otherwise of this flick is going to be down to whether you are willing to accept Steve Carell playing a part relatively straight and restrained, rather than going through the broad comedy moves that have made him so successful. If you cannot accept it, fear not, "Get Smart" will be along later in the year, but for the record I thought he was very good.

"Dan In Real Life" starts off like your typical, incidentally amusing, family drama, but it gets funnier and funnier as it goes along and Carell's frustration with his situation grows. It's not massively original (but if you only saw movies with original ideas, cinematic pickings would be very scarce indeed, wouldn't they?), but "Dan In Real Life" is entertaining, and a good cast (who wouldn't fall in love at first sight with the luminous Juliette Binoche?) make the most of an insightful enough script that contains many a ponder on the meaning and passion of love.

I hope that Steve Carell pushes himself and does something as interesting again.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":99884,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2007-10-26","keywords":"teenage girl,game,young girl,gymnasium,new york city","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Dan in Real Life","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi414318873","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg3NDExMTA1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNzA4ODM4._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg3NDExMTA1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNzA4ODM4._V1_.jpg","description":"Dan in Real Life trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0136797/","name":"Steve Carell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000300/","name":"Juliette Binoche"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176981/","name":"Dane Cook"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0373282/","name":"Peter Hedges"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049348/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042399/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0168855/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0307070/","name":"Pierce Gardner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0373282/","name":"Peter Hedges"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
Vrag nosi Pradu
programme.desc: The Devil Wears Prada: Directed by David Frankel. With Meryl Streep, Anne Hathaway, Emily Blunt, Stanley Tucci. A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0458352/","name":"The Devil Wears Prada","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQ3ZTIzOTItMGNjNC00MWRmLWJlMGEtMjJmMDM5ZDIzZGM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkzODUwNzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0458352/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"santanose"},"dateCreated":"2006-06-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"more devil, less Prada","reviewBody":"Without Meryl Streep, The Devil Wears Prada would get maybe a 5 rating, but because of Ms. Streep giving a performance that will undoubtedly get her a 14th Oscar nomination it is reason alone to see it. Is it even possible for her to do something that is even remotely similar to anyone of her past characters? The answer is NO! Her Miranda Priestley is once again a completely new role that seems made for her and she is so deliciously devilish that you want her in every scene, but we'll settle for a supporting actress nomination come February in a movie that would have essentially been Pricess Diaries 3 without her. A very enjoyable summer fluff movie that is a great escape thanks, once again to the brilliant Meryl Streep.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":389445,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-11-15","keywords":"magazine,fashion,fashion industry,chick flick,work","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Devil Wears Prada","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1425080601","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NjEzNGUtZWRkMy00OTE4LTk2OTktYjI2ODM3NDYwMWI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NjEzNGUtZWRkMy00OTE4LTk2OTktYjI2ODM3NDYwMWI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004266/","name":"Anne Hathaway"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000658/","name":"Meryl Streep"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004978/","name":"Adrian Grenier"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0291205/","name":"David Frankel"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174373/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174362/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112459/","name":"Aline Brosh McKenna"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1916979/","name":"Lauren Weisberger"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0458352, Title: The Devil Wears Prada, --- Description: The Devil Wears Prada: Directed by David Frankel. With Meryl Streep, Anne Hathaway, Emily Blunt, Stanley Tucci. A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0458352/","name":"The Devil Wears Prada","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQ3ZTIzOTItMGNjNC00MWRmLWJlMGEtMjJmMDM5ZDIzZGM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkzODUwNzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0458352/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"santanose","dateCreated":"2006-06-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"more devil, less Prada","reviewBody":"Without Meryl Streep, The Devil Wears Prada would get maybe a 5 rating, but because of Ms. Streep giving a performance that will undoubtedly get her a 14th Oscar nomination it is reason alone to see it. Is it even possible for her to do something that is even remotely similar to anyone of her past characters? The answer is NO! Her Miranda Priestley is once again a completely new role that seems made for her and she is so deliciously devilish that you want her in every scene, but we'll settle for a supporting actress nomination come February in a movie that would have essentially been Pricess Diaries 3 without her. A very enjoyable summer fluff movie that is a great escape thanks, once again to the brilliant Meryl Streep.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":389445,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-11-15","keywords":"magazine,fashion,fashion industry,chick flick,work","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Devil Wears Prada","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1425080601","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NjEzNGUtZWRkMy00OTE4LTk2OTktYjI2ODM3NDYwMWI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NjEzNGUtZWRkMy00OTE4LTk2OTktYjI2ODM3NDYwMWI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004266/","name":"Anne Hathaway","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000658/","name":"Meryl Streep","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004978/","name":"Adrian Grenier"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0291205/","name":"David Frankel"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174373/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174362/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112459/","name":"Aline Brosh McKenna","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1916979/","name":"Lauren Weisberger"],"duration":"PT1H49M"</script><metacontent="

Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće događaje. programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Gospodar prstenova: Povratak kralja
programme.desc:
The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King: Directed by Peter Jackson. With Noel Appleby, Ali Astin, Sean Astin, David Aston. Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0167260/","name":"The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzA5ZDNlZWMtM2NhNS00NDJjLTk4NDItYTRmY2EwMWZlMTY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzkwMjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0167260/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Derek237"},"dateCreated":"2005-03-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"They saved the best for last","reviewBody":"Obviously, I'm aware of the fact that the Lord of the Rings trilogy is actually one giant movie, but since it was released in parts, that's how I'm judging them. The Return Of The King is the final chapter, and since it is the climax and resolution of the epic journey, it has a little more intensity and urgency than the previous installments.

At this point everyone has come to know and love all of the characters, and the stakes have become tremendously high. Kingdoms are at their knees, and the only two characters who can save the day are getting weaker and weaker. The tension was very high in this episode and I can honestly say that out of all 3 this was the only one that had me on the edge of my seat. There were many memorable scenes (one of my favourites including the part with the giant spider)that made this the classic that it is sure to stay for decades to come.

This is the longest of the series, mostly because of the ending that seems to last a while. This was a good ending, and I can see why Frodo did what he did. He, and us the audience, have gone through an incredible ordeal and I think we needed that 20 minute linger. When the battle is over, and the celebrations have ended, there is a sad emptiness felt. The films spanned over 3 years, there have been the extended cuts of course, but after that, it's all over. Peter Jackson gave us an ending that was both appropriate and admirable.

These were some amazing movies and this one in particular is the best, in my opinion. As whole, the Lord Of The Rings is a phenomenon. An absolute phenomenon. Much more than just movies. They have a universal appeal and have touched the hearts and imaginations of millions. I'm one of them.

Sorry if I'm being all fanboyish and kissing this movie's ass, but I really admire it. It may not be among my personal favourites but generally this seems to be the movie event of the century. There will never be another Lord of the Rings film, and that's a bit depressing.

My rating: 10/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1707683,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2004-02-11","keywords":"epic,orc,hobbit,ring,middle earth","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Lord of the Rings Trilogy on Blu-ray","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2073101337","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk1MzkwNTA4N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTU1ODY3MjI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk1MzkwNTA4N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTU1ODY3MjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The trailer for The Lord of the Rings Trilogy on Blu-ray."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000704/","name":"Elijah Wood"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001557/","name":"Viggo Mortensen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005212/","name":"Ian McKellen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001392/","name":"Peter Jackson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046203/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0061706/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0866058/","name":"J.R.R. Tolkien"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0909638/","name":"Fran Walsh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0101991/","name":"Philippa Boyens"}],"duration":"PT3H21M"}</script><metacontent="

The Return Of The King is the final chapter, and since it is the climax and resolution of the epic journey, it has a little more intensity and urgency than the previous installments.

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
Nebesko kraljevstvo
programme.desc:
Kingdom of Heaven: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Martin Hancock, Michael Sheen, Nathalie Cox, Eriq Ebouaney. Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0320661/","name":"Kingdom of Heaven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODczYmE3ZDYtZjIwNC00ZTJhLThkMGUtZDcyNzkyNWMyZDNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzUyMzUy._V1_.jpg","description":"Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0320661/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Duk"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"excellent, fair to islam, sweeping, narrative could have used tightening...","reviewBody":"I really enjoyed this movie. The way the movie started in Europe and how dark it was there... and the journey to Jerusalem... just wonderful stuff up to that point.

Liam Neeson, as usual, is just SO GOOD, you wish he had more screen time.


* Orlando Bloom, actually surprisingly, was able to carry the movie as a lead. I was surprised he had the heft to do it, but I agree with the critic who said that the beard helped. He was a man, not a boy.



* Battle scenes... incredible. I was really surprised that they could wow me, since we've been numbed by the quality of battle scenes in so many previous movies, but they did a great job.



* Portrayal of the Muslims. EXTREMELY fair. In being "even-handed" to Christians and Muslims there, if anything, they emphasized the Christian fanatics (in the form of the Templars in particular, to simplify things) as being the "badguys" more than anyone else... (which is historically accurate to some degree, in my understanding). I was surprised and pleased that they tried to be accurate, and didn't try to emphasize some "BAD MUSLIMS" to make it "even".



* Movie is very secular in it's moralizing.


And it portrays Christianity particularly religious men, VERY badly (the Priest who steals the cross from Bloom's wife's corpse... the Bishop in Jerusalem who's ready to convert to Islam at the first sign of defeat... and who also wants to abandon the civilians... the knights templar...) I thought this got a tad gratuitous. There were really NO GOOD Christian FIGURES IN THE MOVIE. The only good purported Christians were basically acting Agnostic (Bloom, Neeson, etc.) The actual religious Christians were made out to be hypocrites.

Meanwhile Saladhudin was a man of honor.. but also somewhat moderate.


* Movie could definitely have a little more narrative focus and maybe have a little more of an emotional circle for Orlando Bloom character. The emotional arc is ALREADY complete fairly early in the movie (Bloom becomes a man of conscience)... and it's kind of boring since the character doesn't really move after that.


But the movie tackled a HUGE topic and tackled it fairly well. I just wish there was a better script to handle the compelling personal journey for Orlando Bloom (from widower, murderer seeking redemption, lost bastard son) that was PROMISED at the beginning.

It seems that as soon as he brings water to his father's old land, he's just about done his journey, and it turns into a simple historical battle movie. (but a darn good one)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":274954,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-05-04","keywords":"crusader,12th century,jerusalem,templar,knights templar","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Kingdom of Heaven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2492727577","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3MmM0NWYtZTQyYi00NzllLTk3YmEtZDMwZDQyZjk2NTM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3MmM0NWYtZTQyYi00NzllLTk3YmEtZDMwZDQyZjk2NTM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0089217/","name":"Orlando Bloom"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1200692/","name":"Eva Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323361/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1184258/","name":"William Monahan"}],"duration":"PT2H24M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ballon
Balon
programme.desc: Ballon: Directed by Michael Herbig. With Friedrich Mücke, Karoline Schuch, David Kross, Alicia von Rittberg. East Germany, 1979. After initially failing to flee from the East to the West in a self-built hot-air balloon, two families struggle to make a second attempt, while the East German State Police are chasing them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7125774/","name":"Ballon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDM0ODAxZTAtZjE4MS00OGQwLTlmYzctMzdlZTM4NGVlMTY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"East Germany, 1979. After initially failing to flee from the East to the West in a self-built hot-air balloon, two families struggle to make a second attempt, while the East German State Police are chasing them.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7125774/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"deloudelouvain"},"dateCreated":"2020-09-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Quite a story, entertaining and suspenseful.","reviewBody":"There isn't much bad to write about Ballon. I don't know what people could dislike about this movie. To me it was entertaining, with quite a lot of suspense once you're into the story, a good cast (even the kids), and it's all nicely shot. I understand everybody was suspicious of the Stasi at that time, your best friend could betray you, but in this case I think they exaggerated a bit in order to make it more suspensful. But the suspense was the good thing about the story, plus the fact that it's based on a true story which made it even more appealing.
